description.value:
A boreal staff is chiseled from a cylinder of ice to form a spiky, jagged icicle, its surface gleaming with the colors of the northern lights. It gives the air around you a distinct chill. When used as a weapon, a boreal staff is a +3 greater striking frost staff.

Activate1 command

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect Attempt a Strike using the staff. That Strike deals [[/r 2d4[cold]]] additional damage. This additional cold damage ignores cold resistance.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ray of Frost]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chilling Spray], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Snowball]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chilling Spray], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Snowball]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chilling Spray], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Elemental Absorption] (water only)
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chilling Spray], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ice Storm]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cone of Cold], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mantle of the Frozen Heart]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cone of Cold]
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cone of Cold], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Frigid Flurry]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
